title: Daily Reminder that Sam Wise Gamgee was the ultimate support
body:
Just like an a support knows that they must carry the ADC so that the ADC can carry the game, Sam knew he had to carry Frodo so Frodo could carry the ring. 
https://i0.wp.com/38.media.tumblr.com/5f2ce61618ea4c5375936b4715258a12/tumblr_n26jzrlZOi1r503xfo2_500.gif

replies.body: Naturally it's Alfred he's the only one who can survive the bat stare  https://media.giphy.com/media/ylzbUWhDeda8g/giphy.gif
It's because he doesn't see the Batman but a little boy pouting in his Halloween costume.
http://imgur.com/mh1bidL

Sam is by far the most influencial sidekick in cinema history. The story would literally have had a bad ending in many occasions, had he not been there.

https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/13245469_10153616326291966_629634434611616112_n.jpg?oh=9aab5fbcb267e064b1bba39ce73bd560&oe=57E29F4B
Those damn Elise ganks.
Hard to consider him sidekick when Tolkien himself considered him the main character.
no {{champion:89}}  TRIGGERED
Cause no one carries harder than the sun :p
Got you in my sights
No one has anything over Alfred.

Aunt May Parker poisoned the Chameleon once, and became an Herald of Galactus named "Golden Oldie" another time.





**You think I'm joking?**

http://goodcomics.comicbookresources.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/goldenoldie4.jpg
Damn marvel

DC gave the Joker the power of Mr. Mxyzptlk for an entire storyline.

...also, they had Luke Skywalker voice the Joker, and it **worked**.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=glAGg8CjTBc

Alfred is a boss.
http://pa1.narvii.com/6047/e13915c89d58944505fc56a42b13659325e83672_hq.gif

Clearly you people don't know how awesome Alfred is yet :/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=21HgVloXljM
Now you do

http://i.imgur.com/GvyDHGr.png

Sully for best Support

Sam was an amazing support but his ADC left him in the end.

Chewy was also great support who protected his ADC since the beta, bust sadly, he couldn't stop Zed from assassinating him.

Luigi is the "support" who buys a sight stone and then fucks off to become the mid laner.

Alfred supported since hte beta too but didn't lose his ADC, if anything he was the only reason his ADC lived so long being melee and whatnot.

For sona....see Luigi

So, in the LotR, are the Eagles the afk-farming Jungler?

WHY DIDN'T THEY JUST RIDE THE EAGLES?
Gotta stack up dat "Feral" flare.
to be fair, without the eagles they would have never closed out the game.
Luigi is a secret carry.

Why is Sion not there?

SION MAKES AN AMAZING SUPPORT!!!

One of the best LotR quotes of all time! 

[](http://giphy.com/gifs/game-of-thrones-lord-the-rings-facepalm-B9LuqsdyXbuG4)
